channel.title: GitHub trends

item.title: nguyenphutrong/quotio
item.description: Stop juggling AI accounts. Quotio is a beautiful native macOS menu bar app that unifies your Claude, Gemini, OpenAI, Qwen, and Antigravity subscriptions â€“ with real-time quota tracking and smart auto-failover for AI coding tools like Claude Code, OpenCode, and Droid.

item.title: 0xSojalSec/PentestAgent
item.description: All-in-one offensive security toolbox with AI agent and MCP architecture. Integrates tools like Nmap, Metasploit, FFUF, SQLMap. Enables pentesting, bug bounty hunting, threat hunting, and reporting. RAG-based responses with local knowledge base support.
